title: Raanjhanaa 2013 Lossless Soundtrack Album - A. R. Rahman [FLAC]
description:
Raanjhanaa is the soundtrack album, composed by A. R. Rahman, to the 2013 Hindi film Raanjhanaa, directed by Anand L. Rai that stars actor Dhanush, Sonam Kapoor and Abhay Deol in the lead roles. The film is produced by Krishika Lulla under the banner Eros International. The soundtrack's original version has lyrics penned by Irshad Kamil.

Audio Format- FLAC

Channels- 2.0

Tracklist-
1.	"Raanjhanaa"  	-Shiraz Uppal, Jaswinder Singh	04:14
2.	"Banarasiya"  	-Shreya Ghoshal, Anwesha Datta Gupta, Meenal Jain	04:49
3.	"Piya Milenge"  	-Sukhwinder Singh, K.M.M.C. Sufi Ensemble	05:55
4.	"Ay Sakhi"  	-Madhushree, Chinmayee, Vaishali, Aanchal Sethi	04:06
5.	"Nazar Laaye"  	-Rashid Ali, Neeti Mohan, Nakash Aziz	03:56
6.	"Tu Mun Shudi"  	-A. R. Rahman, Rabbi Shergill	04:42
7.	"Aise Na Dekho"  	-A. R. Rahman, Karthik	04:16
8.	"The Land of Shiva"  	-Instrumental	01:10
9.	"Tum Tak"  	-Javed Ali, Pooja Vaidyanath, Keerthi Sagathia	05:04

[I personally love this album and its ingenious songs. ARR never disappoints!]

Keep Seeding, fellas!
